page.title: 16Poor Fund-Stanton-u-Bardon
page.content: In AD 1630{Mr.Luke Jackson,}citizen and girdler of London, gave by will, {Jan.26 1630,}one-third part of the great tithes of Stanton-under-Bardon in the Parish of Thornton to the poor of the parish forever; paying to the Vicar of Thornton out of it,yearly,two pounds for preaching two sermons in this parish,one on 28th July,in remembrance of the defeat of the Spanish Armada in 1588;the other on the 5th November in commemoration of the great deliverance from the Powder Plot,1605. From{"An Historical Sketch of the {Parish of Thornton,Bagworth and {Stanton-under-Bardon"by Rev.H.R.Cooper {1905.
